thread.title: Great Midtown location
thread.title_full: Great Midtown location - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Travel-Addict1984
title: Great Midtown location
text: Great location, just over the road of a subway station, close to Central Park, Rockefeller Centre and Time Square. Nice, clean hotel with generous rooms and good city views when you're on a higher up floor. Shame there wasn't a minibar in the room. Good value for money and the option of having Coffee & Muffin for an extra $1 a night as a great addition.
